comment.author: 60827889@N08
comment._content:
These workers would probably have been brought from the Cape Colony to Walfisch Bay,
which was a Cape / British enclave surrounded by German South West Africa.

comment.author: 61142244@N05
comment._content: The workers could have equally originated from various parts from within Namibia, i.e. the former Ovamboland, ex - Ovaherero and Nama prisoners of wars. The key question is which year  were the tram rails laid?
